text: We're going to show you
how to take a screenshot on your iPad
and then locate the file.
First, make sure you have the page or info

up on the screen that you
want to take a screenshot of.
Now find the home button on your iPad,
which will be at the bottom of your device
in the middle here.
Now find your power button
along the top edge of your iPad
on the right-hand side here.

Hover your fingers over the
home button and power button
and then press them at the same time
to take the screenshot.
If it works, you'll see the device flash

and hear a camera-shutter sound
if your volume is turned up.
If you're using the 2018 iPad Pro,
you'll need to press the power

and volume up buttons at
the same time instead.
Now go to your homepage
and open up your photos application.
The screenshot will be saved
as your most recent photo here.
